author: HomeOnTheRange
title: Flexible set
review: This is a great set.  The building design is fun and flexible as it is quite playable on its own but also can be integrated in a large farm or stable build.  It also has a number of pieces that are really useful for other building.  It has lots of 2x1x2 (two bricks wide, 1 brick deep and 2 high) in white and in blue brick.  These are very useful if you want to make internal walls or thinner walls in general in another build.  It also has multiple red roof slanting pictures and flat green and white pictures.  There are also many cute specialised parts including the hay basket which swings, the two horses, the brown trough, the pitchfork and spade, and two of the pieces that have a lamp or the bridle/horse shoes.  There is also the door.  The cools are attractive and the mini figs can sit on the horses.
